prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalHistoryArchives Title: The Impact of the Silk Road on Ancient Civilizations Description: This article delves into the intricate history of the Silk Road and its profound influence on the development of ancient civilizations. Explore how this ancient trade route shaped cultures, economies, and political systems across Asia, Africa, and Europe.
Yes, I am interested in that article and most any article about history.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CuisineWorld Title: Molecular Gastronomy: The Art and Science of Cooking Description: Dive into the fascinating world of molecular gastronomy. In this comprehensive guide, we break down the science behind this culinary trend. Learn how renowned chefs create visually stunning and taste-bud-tantalizing dishes that blur the line between food and art.
Sorry, I am not interested in that article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AdventurePlanet Title: Experiencing the Arctic: The Ultimate Guide for Polar Travel Description: Dive deep into the icy wonders of the Polar Regions. This guide provides you with all you need to know to make your arctic adventure a reality, from the wildlife you'll encounter to the cultural histories of indigenous communities. Pack your winter gear as we take you on a journey through the frosty wonders of the Arctic.
I am not interested in articles about the Arctic.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HealthnWellness Today Title: The Intersection of Technology and Mental Health: A New Era of Therapy Description: Explore the ways in which technology is reshaping therapy and mental health care. Learn about the latest trends, from AI-powered mental health apps to virtual reality therapy sessions, and their potential to provide affordable and accessible mental health resources for all.
Yes, I would be interested in reading that article.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SportsGalaxy Title: The Evolution of E-Sports: From Basement Pastime to Multibillion Dollar Industry Description: Explore the meteoric rise of E-Sports, from its humble beginnings in arcades to its current status as a global phenomenon. A comprehensive analysis of the industry's growth, the strategic minds behind it, and a look at the future of competitive gaming.
Yes, I would be interested in reading that article. Thank you.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EcoPlanetNews Title: Sustainable Fashion: An Insight into Ethical Clothing Brands Description: This detailed exposition brings to light the practices of sustainable fashion brands, their ethics, and impact on our environment. Understand the process behind their eco-friendly materials and learn how to make informed decisions for your wardrobe that align with your environmental values.
No, I would hate to read an article like that. I prefer not to read anything about the environment or fashion.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceExplorationDaily Title: Terraforming Mars: A Vision for 2100 Description: Venture into the future and imagine a world where Mars is our second home. This article dives into the science, technology, and ethics of terraforming Mars. It looks at the potential challenges, solutions, and implications of transforming the Red Planet into a habitable environment for humans. Would you like to discover what it might take to make life on Mars a reality?
Yes, I would like to read an article like that or anything about space exploration.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: New York Times
Title: In Norway, the Electric Vehicle Future Has Already Arrived
Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
evaluation_results.label: no
evaluation_results.explanation: I don't like the idea of electric cars, and I don't want to read about them.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
